title: Why were the early US colonists apart of companies? What was the reason for calling these groups companies? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: They were companies - which were promoters and investors in North American settlements. The companies provided the land, the ship and the basic tools and hoped they would realize profit from products grown, made or developed in the settlements.
Becouse the colony’s were sponsored by profit company’s, where the colony was supposed to send back product ( tabbaco, grain, minerals, furs etc).
